details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-3:2012 - 6.6.4 Version and conformance level identification - Part number
details.description: The value of pdfaid:part shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms. Files prepared in compliance with this part of ISO 19005 shall use a value of 3.

rule.description: The value of pdfaid:part shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms. Files prepared in compliance with this part of ISO 19005 shall use a value of 3.

error.message: The "part" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is not equal to 3 for a PDF/A-3B conforming file.
